meanings.definition: To cover or mix with sauce.
meanings.sent1: He is saucing the wings with a spicy buffalo sauce.
meanings.sent2: The cook is saucing the meatballs with a savory gravy.
meanings.sent3: She accidentally ended up saucing her hair with ketchup instead of her fries.
meanings.sent4: The storm was saucing the landscape with rain, turning everything into a wet canvas.
meanings.sent5: The artist was saucing the canvas with vibrant colors, creating a masterpiece.
